hymn.title: Jehovah Bless You and Keep You
hymn.notes: The Crystallization-Study of Genesis (3), Message 33, Outline Point IV.

layout.singingstanza: Je -- ho -- vah bless you and keep you; Je -- ho -- vah make His face shine up -- on you And be gra -- cious to you; Je -- ho -- vah lift up His coun -- te -- nance up -- on you And give you peace. peace. God the Fa -- ther's keep -- ing; God the Son is shin -- ing; God the Spir -- it's coun -- te -- nance Cheer -- ing, up -- lift -- ing you; What a Tri -- une bless -- ing; God Him -- self dis -- pens -- ing, For your rich en -- joy -- ment All your days.
